
---
title: 'AF 浏览器收藏扩展 0.7.0 云存储与 UI'
categories: 
 - 编程
 - 开源中国
 - 资讯
headimg: 'https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-001-ee34a0ab1a739593b56693bb542cd460.png'
author: 开源中国
comments: false
date: Sat, 18 Sep 2021 09:01:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-001-ee34a0ab1a739593b56693bb542cd460.png'
---

<div>   
<div class="content">
                                                                                            <div> 
 <h2 style="text-align:start">v0.7.0<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23v070" target="_blank">#</a></h2> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">此版本，我带来了云存储和 UI 改进的内容增强。</p> 
 <h3 style="text-align:start">⚙ 功能性<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23-%25E5%258A%259F%25E8%2583%25BD%25E6%2580%25A7" target="_blank">#</a></h3> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">支持 GoogleDrive 和 OneDrive 来同步您的数据<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E6%2594%25AF%25E6%258C%2581-googledrive-%25E5%2592%258C-onedrive-%25E6%259D%25A5%25E5%2590%258C%25E6%25AD%25A5%25E6%2582%25A8%25E7%259A%2584%25E6%2595%25B0%25E6%258D%25AE" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">现在，除了使用 Newbe API 之外，您还可以通过 GoogleDrive 或者 OneDrive 在多个设备中同步您的数据。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">您可以在控制面板中开启对应的存储方式。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Cloud Sync in control panel" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-001-ee34a0ab1a739593b56693bb542cd460.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">开启之后，您便可以通过 Manager UI 右上角的按钮来同步您的数据。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Login to sync" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-002-0d5d783a68b31fb68f15960f019bcbbb.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">每当同步成功时，您就可以通过 Manager UI 中得到提示。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="sync success" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-003-f260789b0f1efda2b30f938ead69446f.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">搜索历史自动提示<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E6%2590%259C%25E7%25B4%25A2%25E5%258E%2586%25E5%258F%25B2%25E8%2587%25AA%25E5%258A%25A8%25E6%258F%2590%25E7%25A4%25BA" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">现在，当您成功搜索并点击搜索结果时，当前搜索文本将会被记录下来，以便您下次搜索时进行提示。加强您对常用内容的可访问性。</p> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">应用指引增强<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E5%25BA%2594%25E7%2594%25A8%25E6%258C%2587%25E5%25BC%2595%25E5%25A2%259E%25E5%25BC%25BA" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">我们改进了右上角按钮的展示效果，使其更容易理解。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="better buttons" src="data:image/png;base64," referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">我们非常关注您数据的隐私性，因此当用户隐私策略发生变化时，将会弹出提示需要您重新确认。在得到您的重新确认之前，我们将会停止一些相关的与云端交互的功能，以确保您享有充分的知情权。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Privacy Agreement changed" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210815-002-b8ce323dc51fbee4f7a0a267a2d82af8.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">现在，我们将会在得到您同意的情况下收集匿名的程序数据，以便为我们持续的改进程序提供数据参考。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">开启此项，不会收集任何与您个人有关的隐私数据，因此我们邀请您进入控制面板进行开启，您的支持是对此程序健康发展的有力帮助。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">您可以随时在控制面板中操作此开关。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Anonymous Improving" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210815-003-756e940db58e12cc3bcf015ba85cc28e.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">插件将会在首次安装时弹出“欢迎页面”，以便用户可以快速熟悉此插件。</p> 
 <h3 style="text-align:start">🌟 UI<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23-ui" target="_blank">#</a></h3> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">新的头部栏<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E6%2596%25B0%25E7%259A%2584%25E5%25A4%25B4%25E9%2583%25A8%25E6%25A0%258F" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">看起来令人更加舒适的布局和控件摆放方案。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">感谢<span> </span><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FZhuangkh" target="_blank">https://github.com/Zhuangkh</a><span> </span>为此改进做出的贡献。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="New manager style" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210912-001-09c3f9d71d6510f80f4d421fb7a87bb5.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">通知中心<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E9%2580%259A%25E7%259F%25A5%25E4%25B8%25AD%25E5%25BF%2583" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">我们将所有有用的通知都收纳到了最新的通知中心当中，以便您可以高效的了解系统的现状和进行操作。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="Notification Center" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210912-002-4a5bd7c74ccef549dfb2310d0eab78e0.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="New message" src="data:image/png;base64," referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">控制面板 UI 改进<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E6%258E%25A7%25E5%2588%25B6%25E9%259D%25A2%25E6%259D%25BF-ui-%25E6%2594%25B9%25E8%25BF%259B" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">控制面板 UI 迎来了一次小幅度的改版，以便您可以轻松的理解每个功能。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">但功能没有被启用时，将会展示该功能相关的帮助信息，以便您可以了解该功能的作用。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="control panel all disable" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-004-bddcaade6081b99103c82bdafb621b1e.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">当您启用特定的功能时，面板将会被默认折叠以减少空间的占用。当然，您还是可以点击标题以展开面板，查看其中的详细设置。</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="feature enabled" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210829-005-051854c0adda5712b0de7d6fc0b729d9.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <h4 style="text-align:start">增强性改进<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E5%25A2%259E%25E5%25BC%25BA%25E6%2580%25A7%25E6%2594%25B9%25E8%25BF%259B" target="_blank">#</a></h4> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">我们在控制面板中添加了对于 token 过期时间的展示和提示。并且在应用程序启动时，如果即将过期，将会进行提示</p> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start"><img alt="token expired date" src="https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/assets/images/20210815-004-79e64c0720e45a59b4ac75df123db1c8.png" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
 <h3 style="text-align:start">🐞 Bug 修复<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23-bug-%25E4%25BF%25AE%25E5%25A4%258D" target="_blank">#</a></h3> 
 <ul> 
  <li>修复了如果收藏夹层级中存在重名而导致无法导入的问题</li> 
  <li>修复了编辑标签时占用 CPU 过高的问题</li> 
  <li>现在，首次打开 ManagerUI 的传参方式发生了改变，由查询字符串改为了 AfEventHub。这使得用户不会在出现意外弹出编辑框的情况。</li> 
  <li>开发阶段支持使用 Seq 来输出日志，看起来似乎更容易排查错了呢</li> 
  <li>修复了 application insight 没有启用时，可能出现程序错误的问题。</li> 
 </ul> 
 <h3 style="text-align:start">我们迎来了更多的代码贡献者<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-1-Whats-New%23%25E6%2588%2591%25E4%25BB%25AC%25E8%25BF%258E%25E6%259D%25A5%25E4%25BA%2586%25E6%259B%25B4%25E5%25A4%259A%25E7%259A%2584%25E4%25BB%25A3%25E7%25A0%2581%25E8%25B4%25A1%25E7%258C%25AE%25E8%2580%2585" target="_blank">#</a></h3> 
 <p style="color:#1c1e21; text-align:start">此版本，我们迎来了更多的代码贡献者</p> 
 <ul> 
  <li><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FZ4t4r" target="_blank">Z4t4r</a></li> 
  <li><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FZhuangkh" target="_blank">Zhuangkh</a></li> 
 </ul> 
 <p>更多内容可以参阅此版本的里程碑内容 https://github.com/Amazing-Favorites/Amazing-Favorites/milestone/8?closed=1</p> 
 <div> 
  <div style="text-align:start"> 
   <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">软件简介</h3> 
  </div> 
  <div style="text-align:start"> 
   <div style="text-align:left"> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Amazing Favorites 是一款采用 Blazor 技术开发的 Chromium 内核的浏览器插件，因此，其可以被安装到 Chrome / Microsoft Edge / 360 极速浏览器 / Vivaldi / 搜狗高速浏览器 等浏览器之上。<br> 它可以帮助使用者高效的管理和搜索自己的收藏夹，为此增加了一些增强功能：</p> 
    <ul style="list-style-type:disc; margin-left:0; margin-right:0"> 
     <li>支持为链接标记 tag，从而为通过 tag 为链接进行交叉分组</li> 
     <li>支持快捷键操作</li> 
    </ul> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">您可以通过下方链接来快速了解功能。</p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">欢迎使用：<a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F99-0-Welcome" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/99-0-Welcome</a></p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><img alt src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/up-29680d5ddb2078ddcb686dd48e24b4eab5b.gif" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><img alt height="500" src="https://oscimg.oschina.net/oscnet/up-72a8123a5561af03c0e7406462291c45d3d.gif" width="1220" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p> 
    <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">软件下载与安装</h3> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">您可以通过用户手册了解不同浏览器中的安装方式。</p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F01-1-Install-Edge" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/01-1-Install-Edge</a></p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Faf.newbe.pro%2Fzh-Hans%2Fdocs%2F01-0-Install-Chrome" target="_blank">https://af.newbe.pro/zh-Hans/docs/01-0-Install-Chrome</a></p> 
    <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">扩展商城</h3> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Microsoft Edge Store</p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmicrosoftedge.microsoft.com%2Faddons%2Fdetail%2Famazing-favorites%2Fbknjgbpkaloajcphccpcnahegfglfiei" target="_blank">https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/amazing-favorites/bknjgbpkaloajcphccpcnahegfglfiei</a></p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">Chrome Extension Store</p> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0"><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchrome.google.com%2Fwebstore%2Fdetail%2Famazing-favorites%2Fpodhpclhgkdeiechkdceginfehfanhcb" target="_blank">https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/amazing-favorites/podhpclhgkdeiechkdceginfehfanhcb</a></p> 
    <h3 style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">我有新点子</h3> 
    <p style="margin-left:0; margin-right:0">你可以通过以下链接反馈你的想法和BUG：</p> 
    <ul style="list-style-type:disc; margin-left:0; margin-right:0"> 
     <li><a href="https://www.oschina.net/action/GoToLink?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fnewbe36524%2FAmazing-Favorites%2Fissues" target="_blank">https://github.com/newbe36524/Amazing-Favorites/issues</a></li> 
     <li><a href="https://gitee.com/yks/Amazing-Favorites/issues">https://gitee.com/yks/Amazing-Favorites/issues</a></li> 
    </ul> 
   </div>
